thread.title: Actor Tom Hiddleston sings as Hank Williams in Nashville
thread.title_full: Actor Tom Hiddleston sings as Hank Williams in Nashville

title: Actor Tom Hiddleston sings as Hank Williams in Nashville
text: > Entertainment Actor Tom Hiddleston sings as Hank Williams in Nashville In this Saturday, Oct. 17, 2015, photo taken from video, British actor Tom Hiddleston performs at Acme Feed & Seed in Nashville, Tenn., following a film premiere for the Hank Williams’ biopic “I Saw the Light.” Hiddleston, who portrays the iconic country singer in the Sony film set for release in March, surprised guests at an after party with a short set of Williams’ classic country tunes. (AP Photo/Mark Schlicher)
